Class BukkitAsyncAction<T>

java.lang.Object
de.eldoria.eldoutilities.threading.BukkitAsyncAction<T>
Type Parameters:

@Deprecated public final class BukkitAsyncAction<T> extends Object
Deprecated.
Use BukkitFutureResult instead.

  • Method Details

    • changeExecutor

      public static void changeExecutor(ExecutorService executor)
      Deprecated.
      This will change the executor.

      All current running tasks will be canceled.

      It is highly recommended to not do this after startup.

      Parameters:
      executor - new executor

    • supplyAsync

      public static <T> BukkitAsyncAction<T> supplyAsync(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin, Supplier<T> asyncSupplier)
      Deprecated.
      Create a new bukkit action.

      Asynchronous tasks should never access any API in Bukkit. Great care should be taken to assure the thread-safety of asynchronous tasks.

      Type Parameters:
      T - type of asyncSupplier
      Parameters:
      plugin - plugin of action
      asyncSupplier - asyncSupplier which will request the data asynchronous
      Returns:
      new Bukkit action

    • supplyAsync

      public static <T> BukkitAsyncAction<T> supplyAsync(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin, Supplier<T> asyncSupplier, Consumer<Throwable> supplierError)
      Deprecated.
      Create a new bukkit action.

      Asynchronous tasks should never access any API in Bukkit. Great care should be taken to assure the thread-safety of asynchronous tasks.

      Type Parameters:
      T - type of asyncSupplier
      Parameters:
      plugin - plugin of action
      asyncSupplier - asyncSupplier which will request the data asynchronous
      supplierError - error handler for supplier error
      Returns:
      new Bukkit action
